segments.text: Hello , welcome to IBA . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you offer a safety deposit box rental service here ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We certainly do . May I ask you the purpose of the rental ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like to put some valuables inside , you know , documents and jewellery , things like that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . We have various rental periods . How long would you like to rent it for ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can choose a short-term or yearly rental .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll have to ask my wife how long she'll need it for as it is mainly for her belongings . I'll come back after we have discussed it . Thanks for your help .
segments.speaker: S2
